      • canAddItem

        public boolean canAddItem(IItem item)
        returns whether a specified item can be added to the inventory. An item can be added when the when the size of this inventory is less then the maximum number of items in the inventory and the specified item is not null.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to test
        Returns:
        true if the item can be added, else false

      • size

        public int size()
        returns the number of elements in this inventory. The number of items is always less than or equal to the maximum number of items in this inventory
        Returns:
        the number of items in this inventory

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(IItem item)
        returns whether this inventory contains the specified element. More formally this method returns true if and only if this inventory contains at least one item i such that item.equals(i)
        Parameters:
        item - the item whose presence in this inventory is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if this inventory contains the specified item, else false
